definition: posting on a bulletin board/notice/bulletin/to announce
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.chinese: 浏览网上自由译者布告栏。

sentences.english: There was a notice in the supermarket.
Put the calories up on the board, just so people know.
sentences.chinese: 把热量写在布告牌上，让人们知道。

sentences.english: On our library door are two big signs.
sentences.chinese: 我们图书馆门上有两张布告。

sentences.english: A copy of the letter was posted on the noticeboard .
sentences.chinese: 布告牌上张贴了这封信的内容。

sentences.english: She posted an advertisement seeking a house on the housing estate's bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 她在小区的布告栏里贴出了求售房屋的广告。

sentences.english: The teacher pegged a notice to a notice board.
sentences.chinese: 老师把通知钉在布告栏上。

sentences.english: They placarded all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们在全国到处张贴布告。

sentences.english: Angry workers tore the notice down from the noticeboard.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的工人把布告栏上的通告撕了下来。

sentences.english: There's a notice on the board saying that the meeting has been cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 布告板上的通告说会议已经取消了。

sentences.english: I went through the town hall, I saw many people standing in front of the bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 我走过镇公所的时候，看见许多人站在布告牌前边。

sentences.english: He pinned the notice to the board.
sentences.chinese: 他把通知钉在布告牌上。

sentences.english: On the cafe notice board I should think.
sentences.chinese: 我认为可以贴在咖啡馆的布告牌上。

sentences.english: Let me stick this notice on the board.
sentences.chinese: 让我把这个通知贴在布告板上。

sentences.english: Passing the mayor"s office, I saw people standing before the little bulletin board.
sentences.chinese: 经过镇公所，我看见一群人站在小布告牌前。

definition: a notice to reassure the public/advance notice (of an agenda)
(literary) to inform (the public)/to give clear instructions/public announcement (from higher authorities)
imperial bulletin, palace report dating back to Han dynasty
imperial edict/see also 聖諭|圣谕[sheng4 yu4]
imperial edict/see also 上諭|上谕[shang4 yu4]
variant of 曉喻|晓喻[xiao3 yu4]
